page.title: 07Melville Nurseries
page.content: { {Dobbies} or {Melville Nurseries,}is owned by a board of directors. 50 acres of their land is freehold, 25 acres is leasehold. over 1OO people work here, more in summer as well as growing plants they sell garden equipment such as {Weed {killer, Fencing, garden paving, plant {pots, concrete boxes for plants. In the 5O acer area are a variety of{ things,{A play area for Chilldren,1 {huge car park, 1 tea room,Toilets {Aqua World, }which sells many fish and birds from far away countries and oceans. They sell parrots and many types of fish.In their 25 acre site they grow open ground shrubs and trees with plants making exceptional growth in a season. Grainne Barkess.
